step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Keep your arms stretched overhead and fingers open.
You're doing well stretching your arms back overhead. Remember to exhale and relax as you do this.
Great job making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together. Inhale and tighten your muscles during this part.
You're effectively stretching your arms back overhead and exhaling. Keep up the good work relaxing.
Excellent execution of the final step. You're consistently completing the repetitions with good form.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arms stretched overhead with fingers open, then make a fist while squeezing your shoulder blades. Exhale as you stretch back and inhale as you tighten.
